verses.verse: And at that <S%H6256>time<s%> shall <S%H4317>Michael<s%> stand <S%H5975>up<s%>, the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8269>prince<s%> which <S%H5975>stands<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%>: and there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>, such as never was since there was a <S%H1471>nation<s%> even to that same <S%H6256>time<s%>: and at that <S%H6256>time<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered<s%>, every one that shall be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%>.

And <S%H7227>many<s%> of them that <S%H3463>sleep<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> shall <S%H6974>awake<s%>, some to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2416>life<s%>, and some to <S%H2781>shame<s%> and <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1860>contempt<s%>.

And they that be <S%H7919>wise<s%> shall <S%H2094>shine<s%> as the <S%H2096>brightness<s%> of the <S%H7549>firmament<s%>; and they that turn <S%H7227>many<s%> to <S%H6663>righteousness<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

But <S%H1840>you<s%>, O Daniel, shut <S%H5640>up<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%>, and <S%H2856>seal<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%>, even to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end<s%>: <S%H7227>many<s%> shall run to and <S%H7751>forth<s%>, and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> shall be <S%H7235>increased<s%>.

Then I <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H5975>and<s%>, behold, there stood <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%>, the <S%H259>one<s%> on this <S%H2008>side<s%> of the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> on that side of the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%>.

And one <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%>, which was <S%H4605>upon<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%>, How long shall it be to the <S%H7093>end<s%> of these <S%H6382>wonders<s%>?

And I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> in <S%H906>linen<s%>, which was <S%H4605>upon<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%>, when he held <S%H7311>up<s%> his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and his left <S%H8040>hand<s%> unto <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H7650>swore<s%> by him that <S%H2416>lives<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> that it shall be for a <S%H4150>time<s%>, <S%H4150>times<s%>, and a <S%H2677>half<s%>; and when he shall have <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> to <S%H5310>scatter<s%> the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, all these things shall be <S%H3615>finished<s%>.
And I <S%H8085>heard<s%>, but I <S%H995>understood<s%> <S%H559>not<s%>: then said <S%H113>I<s%>, O my Lord, what shall be the end of these <S%H319>things<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Go your <S%H3212>way<s%>, <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>: for the <S%H1697>words<s%> are closed <S%H5640>up<s%> and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> until the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end<s%>.

<S%H7227>Many<s%> shall be <S%H1305>purified<s%>, and made <S%H3835>white<s%>, and <S%H6884>tried<s%>; but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall do <S%H7561>wickedly<s%>: and none of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H995>understand<s%>; but the <S%H7919>wise<s%> shall <S%H995>understand<s%>.

And from the <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H8548>daily<s%> sacrifice shall be taken <S%H5493>away<s%>, and the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> that makes <S%H8074>desolate<s%> set <S%H5414>up<s%>, there shall be a <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%H2442>waits<s%>, and <S%H5060>comes<s%> to the <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.
But go you your <S%H3212>way<s%> until the <S%H7093>end<s%> <S%H5117>be<s%>: for you shall rest, and <S%H5975>stand<s%> in your <S%H1486>lot<s%> at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%>.
